channel.title: Devsecops on securi(tty)

item.title: DVNA
item.description: As a project for upcoming company’s internal hackday I choose to make workshops for secure coding in JavaScript, based on OWASP TOP 10 and Damn Vulnerable NodeJS Application. While I’m no coder by myself, I thought I might prepare as much I can from security perspective and use some feeback from more knowledgeable collegue in terms of code itself. The idea came when I stumbled upon “solution” book to DVNA itself from AppSeco.
